title: Which occurs following depreciation of USD

content.question: Which of the following is likely to occur following the depreciation of the United States dollar?

choices.label: Demand for the United States dollar will decrease.
United States demand for foreign currencies will increase.
United States goods will become more expensive in foreign markets.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
